<<FORMULA_0139>>.formula:
\mu_{\v{z}, \v{m'}, \v{S'}}(\cdot)
&=
\mu(\cdot)
+
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(\m{L}\v{m}'-\mu(\v{z}))
\\
\label{eq:whitened_variational_posterior_mean}
&=
\mu(\cdot)
+
k(\cdot, \v{z})
\m{L}^{-\top}
(\v{m}' - \m{L}^{-1}\mu(\v{z}))
,
\\
k_{\v{z}, \v{m}', \v{S}'}(\cdot, \cdot')
&=
k(\cdot, \cdot')
-
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(k(\v{z}, \v{z}) - \m{L}\m{S}'\m{L}^\top)
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
k(\v{z}, \cdot')
\\
\label{eq:whitened_variational_posterior_kernel}
&=
k(\cdot, \cdot')
-
k(\cdot, \v{z})
\m{L}^{-\top}
(\m{I} - \m{S'})
\m{L}^{-1}
k(\v{z}, \cdot').
<<FORMULA_0139>>.raw_latex:
\begin{align}
\mu_{\v{z}, \v{m'}, \v{S'}}(\cdot)
&=
\mu(\cdot)
+
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(\m{L}\v{m}'-\mu(\v{z}))
\\
\label{eq:whitened_variational_posterior_mean}
&=
\mu(\cdot)
+
k(\cdot, \v{z})
\m{L}^{-\top}
(\v{m}' - \m{L}^{-1}\mu(\v{z}))
,
\\
k_{\v{z}, \v{m}', \v{S}'}(\cdot, \cdot')
&=
k(\cdot, \cdot')
-
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(k(\v{z}, \v{z}) - \m{L}\m{S}'\m{L}^\top)
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
k(\v{z}, \cdot')
\\
\label{eq:whitened_variational_posterior_kernel}
&=
k(\cdot, \cdot')
-
k(\cdot, \v{z})
\m{L}^{-\top}
(\m{I} - \m{S'})
\m{L}^{-1}
k(\v{z}, \cdot').
\end{align}

<<FORMULA_0125>>.formula:
\label{eq:addition_theorem}
    \sum_{j = 1}^J \phi_{k, j}(x)\phi_{k, j}(x') = c_{k, d} C_k^{(\alpha)}(x\cdot x')

<<FORMULA_0082>>.formula:
\v{m}^l = P_{\v{z}^l} \widetilde{\v{m}}^l
,
&&
\m{S}^l = P_{\v{z}^l} \widetilde{\m{S}}^l P_{\v{z}^l}^{\top}
,
&&
P_{\v{z}^l} = P_{z^l_1} \oplus \ldots \oplus P_{z^l_m}
,
<<FORMULA_0082>>.raw_latex:

,

,

,

<<FORMULA_0080>>.formula:
\v{m}^l = (\v{m}^l_1, \ldots, \v{m}^l_m)
,
&&
\v{m}^l_j \in T_{z^l_j} X
,
&&
\operatorname{im}(\m{S}^l) \subseteq T_{z^l_1} X \x \ldots \x T_{z^l_m} X
,
<<FORMULA_0080>>.raw_latex:
\[
\v{m}^l = (\v{m}^l_1, \ldots, \v{m}^l_m)
,
&&

,
&&
\operatorname{im}(\m{S}^l) \subseteq T_{z^l_1} X \x \ldots \x T_{z^l_m} X
,
\]

<<FORMULA_0044>>.formula:
F = f^L \circ f^{L-1} \circ \cdots \circ f^2 \circ f^1,
    &&
    f^l\colon X \to X
    \t{~for~}
    1 \leq l \leq L-1
    ,
<<FORMULA_0044>>.raw_latex:
\[
    F = f^L \circ f^{L-1} \circ \cdots \circ f^2 \circ f^1,
    &&
    f^l\colon X \to X
    \t{~for~}
    1 \leq l \leq L-1
    ,
\]

<<FORMULA_0034>>.formula:
\label{eq:variational_posterior_mean_and_kernel}
\mu_{\v{z}, \v{m}, \v{S}}(\cdot)
&=
\mu(\cdot)
+
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(\v{m}-\mu(\v{z}))
,
\\
k_{\v{z}, \v{m}, \v{S}}(\cdot, \cdot')
&=
k(\cdot, \cdot')
-
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(k(\v{z}, \v{z}) - \m{S})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
k(\v{z}, \cdot')
.
<<FORMULA_0034>>.raw_latex:
\[
\label{eq:variational_posterior_mean_and_kernel}
\mu_{\v{z}, \v{m}, \v{S}}(\cdot)
&=
\mu(\cdot)
+
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(\v{m}-\mu(\v{z}))
,
\\
k_{\v{z}, \v{m}, \v{S}}(\cdot, \cdot')
&=
k(\cdot, \cdot')
-
k(\cdot, \v{z})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
(k(\v{z}, \v{z}) - \m{S})
k(\v{z}, \v{z})^{-1}
k(\v{z}, \cdot')
.
\]
